scoringPlays.text: Derrick Henry 17 Yd Run (Adam Griffith Kick)
Derrick Henry 2 Yd Run (Adam Griffith Kick)
Richard Mullaney 21 Yd pass from Jake Coker (Adam Griffith Kick)
Cyrus Jones 43 Yd Punt Return (Adam Griffith Kick)
Calvin Ridley 30 Yd pass from Jake Coker (Adam Griffith Kick)
Cyrus Jones 72 Yd Punt Return (Adam Griffith Kick)
Bo Scarbrough 1 Yd Run (Adam Griffith Kick)
Kyle Copeland 3 Yd Run (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)
Damien Harris 6 Yd Run (JK Scott Kick)

videos.description: Derrick Henry run for 17 yds for a TD (Adam Griffith KICK)
videos.headline: D. Henry run for 17 yds for a TD, (A. Griffith KICK)

videos.description: Derrick Henry run for 2 yds for a TD (Adam Griffith KICK)
videos.headline: D. Henry run for 2 yds for a TD, (A. Griffith KICK)

videos.description: Alabama's Richard Mullaney skies in the back of the end zone to make a diving catch that was initially called incomplete but changed to a touchdown after video review.
videos.headline: Mullaney makes the nastiest of TD catches

videos.description: Truett Burns punt for 22 yds , Cyrus Jones returns for 43 yds for a TD
videos.headline: T. Burns punt for 22 yds,C. Jones returns for 43 yds for a TD

videos.description: Jake Coker pass complete to Calvin Ridley for 30 yds for a TD (Adam Griffith KICK)
videos.headline: J. Coker pass,to C. Ridley for 30 yds for a TD, (A. Griffith KICK)

videos.description: Kyle Copeland run for 9 yds to the ChaSo 35 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: K. Copeland run for 9 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Alabama's Cyrus Jones takes the punt off a hop and then goes 72 yards untouched for his second punt return touchdown of the day.
videos.headline: Jones racks up second punt return TD of game

videos.description: Kyle Copeland run for a loss of 8 yards to the ChaSo 6 Kyle Copeland fumbled, recovered by Alab Cyrus Jones
videos.headline: K. Copeland run for -8 yds,K. Copeland fumbled, recovered by Alab C. Jones

videos.description: Bo Scarbrough run for 1 yd for a TD
videos.headline: B. Scarbrough run for 1 yd for a TD

videos.description: Kyle Copeland pass intercepted Jabriel Washington return for 34 yds to the ChaSo 30
videos.headline: K. Copeland pass intercepted,J. Washington return  for 34 yds

videos.description: Cooper Bateman pass complete to Daylon Charlot for 1 yd to the ChaSo 26
videos.headline: C. Bateman pass,to D. Charlot for 1 yd

videos.description: Kyle Copeland pass complete to Saire Davis for 35 yds to the Alab 3 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: K. Copeland pass,to S. Davis for 35 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Kyle Copeland run for 3 yds for a TD
videos.headline: K. Copeland run for 3 yds for a TD

videos.description: Damien Harris run for 6 yds for a TD
videos.headline: D. Harris run for 6 yds for a TD
